questionTitle: Benjamin Franklin, <u><font color='red'>as an</font></u> inventor, <u><font color='red'>he</font></u> had broad interests, mechanical skills, <u><font color='red'>persistence</font></u>, and a practical view <u><font color='red'>of</font></u> life.

A jellyfish, which <u><font color='red'>isn't</font></u> really <u><font color='red'>a</font></u> fish, <u><font color='red'>it</font></u> has no brain, no <u><font color='red'>bones</font></u> and no face.
